title: RP
body: So today i got a $10 rp card, and when i came home and used it, it said that it was already used, {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  im hoping that i can get a refund

replies.body: We can look into this for you and figure out what happened with your card.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can check this out.  We'll reply back asap!
